IF( NOT AGG_FOUND )
    IF ( WXART2D_USE_AGGDRAWER )
#           ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(  agg-2.4 )
    ENDIF( WXART2D_USE_AGGDRAWER )
ENDIF( NOT AGG_FOUND )

IF( NOT AGG_FOUND )
    IF ( WXART2D_USE_AGGDRAWER )
           ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(  agg2 )
    ENDIF( WXART2D_USE_AGGDRAWER )
ENDIF( NOT AGG_FOUND )

IF ( WXART2D_USE_KBOOL )
       ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( kbool )
ENDIF( WXART2D_USE_KBOOL )

IF( NOT FREETYPE_FOUND )
    IF ( WXART2D_USE_FREETYPE )
        ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( freetype )
    ENDIF( WXART2D_USE_FREETYPE )
ENDIF( NOT FREETYPE_FOUND )

IF( NOT IRRXML_FOUND )
    IF ( WXART2D_USE_IRRXML )
        ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( irrxml-1.2 )
    ENDIF( WXART2D_USE_IRRXML )
ENDIF( NOT IRRXML_FOUND )

IF ( EXISTS ${wxart2d_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/propedit )
       ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( propedit )
ENDIF ( EXISTS ${wxart2d_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/propedit )
